oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Raymond B. Witt correspondence with Martin Ochs, 1968 August 23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Witt, Raymond B., 1915-2000
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Raymond B. Witt to Chattanooga Times editor Martin Ochs arguing against the newspaper's endorsement of the consolidation of Chattanooga schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: School integration -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
